SEARCH
Package seasofyore.core

Class Board

java.lang.Object
seasofyore.core.Board
public class Board extends Object
Represents the game board in the Seas of Yore game, managing players, their quadrants, and game-play phases.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Board()
    Constructs a new Board object, initializing the quadrants, players, and game state.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Constructs a new Board object, initializing the quadrants, players, and game state.
      • The Britons (Player 1) and Franks (Player 2) are initialized with their respective quadrants.
      • The game starts in the setup phase with the Britons as the current player.

  • Method Details

    • placeShip

      public boolean placeShip(Player player, Ship ship, ShipHeading heading)
      Places a ship for the specified player during the setup phase.
      Parameters:
      player - the player placing the ship
      ship - the ship to place
      heading - the heading of the ship
      Returns:
      true if the ship was placed successfully; false otherwise

    • fireAtCell

      public boolean fireAtCell(Player attacker, int x, int y)
      Fires at a specific cell in the enemy's quadrant.
      Parameters:
      attacker - the attacking player
      x - the x-coordinate of the target cell
      y - the y-coordinate of the target cell
      Returns:
      true if the target was hit; false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if called during the setup phase

    • switchTurns

      public void switchTurns()
      Switches turns between the two players. If the setup phase ends, the game transitions to the battle phase.

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over.
      Returns:
      true if one of the players has lost; false otherwise

    • isSetupPhase

      public boolean isSetupPhase()
      Checks if the game is in the setup phase.
      Returns:
      true if in the setup phase; false otherwise

    • hasCurrentFinishedSetup

      public boolean hasCurrentFinishedSetup()
      Checks if the current player has finished placing their ships.
      Returns:
      true if the current player has placed all ships; false otherwise

    • hasNextFinishedSetup

      public boolean hasNextFinishedSetup()
      Checks if the next player has finished placing their ships.
      Returns:
      true if the next player has placed all ships; false otherwise

    • isPlacementFinal

      public boolean isPlacementFinal()
      Checks if ship placement is final, meaning all ships for both players have been placed.
      Returns:
      true if placement is final; false otherwise

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Gets the player whose turn it currently is.
      Returns:
      the current player

    • getNextPlayer

      public Player getNextPlayer()
      Gets the next player whose turn it will be.
      Returns:
      the next player

    • getBritons

      public Player getBritons()
      Gets the Britons player.
      Returns:
      the Britons player

    • getFranks

      public Player getFranks()
      Gets the Franks player.
      Returns:
      the Franks player

    • getNextQuadrantPanel

      public QuadrantPanel getNextQuadrantPanel()
      Creates and returns the QuadrantPanel for the next player.
      Returns:
      the next player's QuadrantPanel

    • getCurrentQuadrantPanel

      public QuadrantPanel getCurrentQuadrantPanel()
      Creates and returns the QuadrantPanel for the current player.
      Returns:
      the current player's QuadrantPanel

    • getNextQuadrant

      public PlayerQuadrant getNextQuadrant()
      Gets the quadrant representing the next player's territory.
      Returns:
      the next player's PlayerQuadrant

    • getCurrentQuadrant

      public PlayerQuadrant getCurrentQuadrant()
      Gets the quadrant representing the current player's territory.
      Returns:
      the current player's PlayerQuadrant
